sqlMap.select: SELECT A.OLD_RUN oldRun, A.RUN_CODE runCode, NVL(B.RUN_NAME, '未知') runName, TO_CHAR(A.RUN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') runTime, A.USER_PASSWD userPasswd, A.USER_GRADE_CODE userGradeCode, A.CARD_TYPE cardType, A.STOP_FLAG stopFlag FROM CS_USERDETAILDEAD_INFO A, CS_RUNCODE_DICT B WHERE A.ID_NO = #ID_NO# AND A.RUN_CODE = B.RUN_CODE(+)
